amendment.description: An amendment numbered 61 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to strike funding for the National Endowment for the Humanities.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike funding for the National Endowment for the Humanities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 292 (Roll no. 571).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 292 (Roll no. 571).
